description: This table contains the PLF (patient location facility) record and/or department type used to get the routing information for the order record.  It will only contain rows that have at least one value in either the ROUTING_DEPT_PLF_ID column or the ROUTING_DEPT_TYPE_C column.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: ROUTING_DEPT_PLF_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the PLF (patient location facility) record that is used to determine the order routing information.

columns.name: ROUTING_DEPT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The phase of care category ID for an order record, used as a routing department to route the order when a specific department is known.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
